RSVP CONFIRMATION
We have received your RSVP to the Perrier-Jouët Belle Epoque 2007 'Small Discoveries' by mischer'traxler champagne reception. However, we regret to inform you that the event has been postponed to 17th May 2016.
Do let us know <[[mailto: Maybelline.tan@pernod-ricard.com]]> if you are still able to attend.
We apologise for the inconvenience.
We look forward to welcoming you and your friend.
You may pick up your tickets from 6.30 pm at the National Gallery Singapore. Please take note that this is a ladies-only event.
Please download your invite here <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/rs/398-RDG-552/images/sgn-brn-pj-april.pdf]]>.
Thank you.
